Blue Hills Kicks of the 2014 Race Season

Apr 7, 2014 â€¢ {"display_name"=>"Pedro", "login"=>"Pedro", "email"=>"pedro@bluehillscycling.com", "url"=>""}

The racing season is in full swing and the BHCC road team was spread out across the Northeast in both upstate NY for the Tour of the Battenkill as well as Marblehead, MA for the Michael Schott Memorial Circuit Race. There were a lot of great results at both Check out the latest Reports in the Forum!

Michael Schott Memorial Memorial Circuit Race (Apr 6 2014)
Michael O'donnell Men C4 C5 6 / 74
Andrew Rothstein Men C4 C5 16 / 74
Nate Sievers Men C4 C5 30 / 74
Scott Harrington Men C4 C5 65 / 74
Tour of the Battenkill Gran Fondo (Apr 6 2014)
John Bosley Men Gran Fondo Master 60-64 6 / 9
Jeffrey Bradley Men Gran Fondo Master 55-59 20 / 22
Michael f. Connolly Men Gran Fondo Master 50-54 27 / 33
